Parameters: String: the name of the property
String: the current value, which may be null
DriverPropertyInfo(java.lang.String,java.Description: Constructs a DriverPropertyInfo object with a given name and value. The description and choices are intialized to null and required is initialized to false.

ClassDesc: Driver properties for making a connection. The DriverPropertyInfo class is of interest only to advanced programmers who need to interact with a Driver via the method getDriverProperties to discover and supply properties for connections.
